name: Al Miller
introduction: Allen "Al" Miller (born 28 April 1907 and died 18 August 1967) was an American racing driver who raced in the Indianapolis 500 13 times, with a highest finishing position of 6th in 1934. He is one of only three drivers to race in the Indianapolis 500 with a prosthetic leg. He unsuccessfully attempted to qualify for the 1950 Indianapolis 500.
